body:
I believed we can do the debugging more easily in python level, e.g.
```
input_gdef = build_model()
with open('/tmp/input_gdef', 'w') as f:
  f.write(str(input_gdef))
output_gdef = trt.create_inference_graph(input_gdef)
with open('/tmp/output_gdef', 'w') as f:
  f.write(str(output_gdef))
```
So I think we don't need these logs and file outputs. Revert them?
